data.text: Nɨbi gos nepɨm ak kelɨgɨl ma apyap pakɨnɨmɨb agɨl, nɨbop takaw anɨgɨl apin ak agak.

16.2-3 Mat 24.9, Luk 6.22, Jon 9.22, 9.34, 15.21, Apo 8.1, 26.9-11, Lom 10.2, 1 Ko 2.8, 1 Ti 1.13 Nɨbop Juda apnan gɨpal kal okok ag seŋ yokɨl, tepayaŋ ma ownɨmɨb agɨnɨgabal agak. Pen anɨb anep mel agak. Kɨdek ñɨn ak Bapi chɨlopapɨl ma nepal tek, anɨgon God nop tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, nɨbop paklɨnɨgabal agak.
16.4 Jon 13.19, 14.29 Pen nɨbop takaw anɨgɨl apin ak nɨm, kɨdek ñɨn ak tay gek nɨŋɨd, agɨnek tek geb agɨl nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak.
16.5 Jon 7.33, 13.3, 13.36, 14.28, 16.10, 16.16 Mɨñɨl pen bɨ yɨp agyokek ownek ak yɨl adɨkɨd amebin tek, nɨbop agebin agak. Pen nɨbi olap, akal ameban agɨl, yɨp ma agnepɨm agak.
16.6 Jon 14.1, 16.22 Takaw anɨb ak agen nɨgem, mɨdupmɨdup nɨbop ak puŋɨl ñak agak.

16.7 Jon 14.16, 14.26, 15.26, Apo 2.33, Epe 4.8 Pen yad nɨbop takaw nɨŋɨd apin, nɨbop kelɨgɨl amebin ak, tep yɨbɨl amebin agak. Yad ma amenɨgayn, Bɨ Gɨtep Gep ak nɨbop kod yenɨgab ak ma ownɨgab agak. Pen yad amnɨgayn ak, nop agyoken nɨbop ownɨgab agak.
Ne apɨl binɨb lum awl okok kɨlop gek, tap si tap tɨmel gep jɨj ak nɨgtep gɨl, suŋtep mɨdep jɨj ak nɨgtep gɨl, God binɨb okok bɨlokep jɨj ak nɨgtep gɨl gɨnɨgabal agak.
16.9 Jon 3.18, 15.22, Apo 2.22-37 Tap si tap tɨmel gep jɨj ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, yɨp gos ma lɨnepal agak.
16.10 Jon 3.14, 5.32, Apo 2.32, 5.31, Lom 4.25 Suŋtep mɨdep jɨj ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, yad am Bapi ayɨp yenɨgayn ak, yɨp pel ma nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak.

16.11 Jon 12.31, Apo 26.18, Epe 2.2, Kol 2.15, Hib 2.14 God binɨb okok bɨlokep jɨj ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, bɨawl binɨb lum awl yɨl ak kɨlop kodup ak, God bɨ anɨb anop bɨlokɨl ag gɨl agup, Yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨmɨn agup agak.
Takaw yad kuŋay yɨbɨl mɨdeb ak pen, takaw anɨb okok mɨñɨl agen, nɨg dɨnɨmɨb tek ma lup agak.

16.13 Jon 14.17, 14.26, 15.26, 1 Jo 2.20, 2.27 Pen God Kawnan nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agup ak apɨl, nɨbop gos ñek takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdupsek nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Takaw ne ke dɨl ma agɨnɨgab, God takaw agɨnɨgab ak nɨŋɨd agɨnɨgab agak. Pen kɨdek gɨnɨgab takaw ak nɨbop agñɨgɨnɨgab agak.
Ne takaw yad ak dɨl nɨbop agñɨnɨgab agak. Agñɨnɨgab ak nɨm, yɨb yɨp dad aplanɨgab agak.
16.15 Mat 11.27, Jon 3.35, 17.10 Bapi tap ne okok, mɨdupsek tap yad mɨdeb, anɨb ak tek yad apin, God Kawnan ne ak takaw yad ak dɨl nɨbop agñɨnɨgab apin agak.
Pen Jisas ne anɨb agak, Sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgebɨm agak. Pen kɨdek sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp tepayaŋ nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak.

Jisas anɨb agek, bɨne ogɨnap kɨli ke nep agɨlak, Takaw chɨnop agup ak jɨj anɨb ak tay agɨlak? Ne agup, Sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgebɨm pen, kɨdek sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp tepayaŋ nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agup agɨlak. Pen abe anɨb agup, Jɨj anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, yad Bapi yɨl amebin agup agɨlak.
Anɨb ak agɨlɨg agɨlak, Sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl agup ak, tap anɨb ak tay agɨlak? Takaw agup anɨb ak, jɨj ak ma nopun agɨlak.

Anɨb agɨl, Jisas nop agnɨgɨnɨg gelak, ne ke nɨŋɨd kɨlop agak, Sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgebɨm ak pen, kɨdek sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, yɨp tepayaŋ nɨgɨnɨgabɨm apin ak nɨŋɨd nɨm, penpen agnɨgebɨm akaŋ agak?
Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, nɨbop chɨb gek, chaŋ lɨl yenɨgabɨm ak pen, binɨb lum awl okok mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabal agak. Gos awl nɨŋɨd chaŋ lɨnɨgabɨm ak pen, chaŋ kelɨgɨl mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabɨm agak.
16.21 Ais 26.17 Bin olap ñapay ñɨŋaknɨŋ, gos awl nɨgup ak pen, ñapay won ak tɨkɨl, gos awl ma nɨgup agak. Tɨkek, ñapay ne lum awl owup ak nɨm, nop tep yɨbɨl gup agak.

16.22 Ais 66.14, Luk 24.41, 24.52, Jon 14.1, Apo 2.46, 1 Pi 1.8 Anɨb ak, nɨbi mɨñɨl gos awl nɨgebɨm agak. Yad pen nɨbop tepayaŋ nɨgem, nɨbop tep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Anɨgek, mɨñmɨñ nɨbi anɨb ak bɨ olap tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lɨnɨgab agak.

16.23 Mat 7.7, Jon 14.13, 15.16 Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, yɨp ma agnɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, nɨbi Jisas binɨb ne mɨdobun agɨl, Bapi nop tap tɨtay agnɨgenɨgabɨm, agɨnɨgabɨm tek nɨbop ñɨnɨgab agak.
16.24 Jon 15.11 Ned Jisas binɨb ne mɨdobun agɨl, God nop ma agnepek agak. Mɨñɨl pen God nop agnɨgem, agnɨgɨnɨgabɨm tek dɨnɨgabɨm ak nɨm, nɨbop tep tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak.
Pen Jisas ne anɨb agak, Takaw nɨbop apin anɨb okok, pel takaw paladaŋ lɨl apin ak pen, kɨdek takaw anɨb ak tek ma agɨnɨgayn agak. Bapi jɨj ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb ak agɨnɨg, mɨseŋ yɨbɨl agñɨnɨgayn agak.
Ñɨn anɨb ak apek, Jisas binɨb ne mɨdobun agɨl, Bapi nop agnɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Pen yɨp agnɨgem, yad pen Bapi nop agnɨgɨnɨgayn agɨl, ma agebin agak.
16.27 Jon 14.21-23 Bapi ne ke nɨbop mapen lup agak. Nɨbi yɨp mapen lɨl, yad God yɨl ownek ak gos nepɨm agak. Anɨb ak, nɨbop mapen lup tek, agnɨgem nɨbop nɨgɨnɨgab agak.
Ned Bapi yɨl apɨl, lum awl ownek agak. Mɨñɨl lum awl kelɨgɨl, Bapi yɨl adɨkɨd amebin agak.
Anɨb agek, bɨne okok agɨlak, Ey, mɨñɨl takaw paladaŋ lɨl ma ageban, mɨseŋ yɨbɨl ageban agɨlak.

16.30 Jon 2.25, 16.27, 17.8, 21.17 Ak nɨm chɨn nopun, nad tap okok mɨdupsek nepan agɨlak. Bɨ olap takaw won olap mɨdeb nep agnɨgɨnɨgab ak, nep ma agnɨgup won ak, nad ke nɨŋɨd nop agñɨban agɨlak. Gɨpan anɨb ak chɨn gos nopun, nad God yɨl ownak agɨlak.
Anɨb agelak, Jisas kɨlop pen agak, Mɨñɨl yɨp gos lɨnɨgebɨm akaŋ agak?

16.32 Mat 26.31, 26.56, Mak 14.27, Jon 8.29, 20.10 Nɨgɨm. Ñɨn ak wulep wulep apeb ak pen apjakup, nɨbop yuk yokel, yɨp kelɨgɨl man nɨbi keke amem, yad ke awsek yenɨgayn agak. Pen Bapi ayɨp yonɨgabul anɨb ak tek, ke awsek ma yenɨgayn agak.

16.33 Jon 14.27, Lom 5.1, 8.37, Epe 2.14, 2 Ti 3.12, 1 Jo 4.4, 5.4 Nɨbi yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, takaw anɨb okok nɨbop agñɨbin agak. Lum awl mɨdɨl, nɨbop mɨŋel gɨnɨgab ak pen, gos sek yenɨmɨb agak. Tap lum awl yɨl ak mɨdupsek taw jɨsɨpuk gɨpin agak.
